job_objectives.content:
JOB OBJECTIVES:

Future Web Developer with highly and professionally developed interpersonal skills. Psychological background and experience guarantee high level of communication, assertiveness and self-knowledge. Strongly motivated to re-qualify and start career in web development.

job_short.td2: Delivery Driver (UK) – subcontractor of Onemotion Logistic Ltd
Care assistant (UK)- Glais House Nursing Home in Glais, Swansea
Coach (PL)- I made over 500 h of training courses developing psychological skills as communication, assertivity, parenting skills etc.

Psychologist (therapist) (PL)I worked in health care and social assistance units. My support was directed to children, adults, couples and families, addicted people, the mentally ill and the mentally disturbed.

job_long.td2:
Warehouse Operative (UK)- Premier People, Belfast
Driving LLOP and picking products, using picking voice system.

Production Operative- Industrial Temps, Lisburn.
  • Finlay's Foods,Moira (full time)- making variety of production tasks, packing,loading pallet, making production raports.
  • Glanbia Cheese, Magheralin (part time)- variety of production tasks, checking product quality, packing.

Delivery Driver- self-employed, subcontractor of Onemotion Logistic Ltd.
I was delivering Amazon's parcels to customers.

Care assistant- Glais House Nursing Home in Glais, Swansea.
I was helping residents in daily activities, my duties were: bath, shower, bed making, bed bath, making bad with person in it, hair care, oral hygiene, shaving, dressing/undressing, documetning/raporting information, moving and handling, hoisting, pressure area care, feeding, using bed pans, changing pads, feeding, preparing food.

Educational Psychologist- Centre of Rehabilitation and Education in Chorzów Polish Association for People with Mental Retardation (Poland)
I was working as a therapist with children in learning difficulties, emotional problems, disabilities and complex development disorders.

Counselling Psychologist- Centre of Intervention in Crisis and Addictions Counteracting in Bytom (Poland)
Working as a therapist (individual and group therapy) with children and adults with life issues problems as: mental health problems, domestic violence, sexual abuse, traumas, emotional disorders, bereavement.

Forensic psychologist- Domestic Diagnosis- Counselling Unit no 1 in Katowice (Poland)
Writing psychological diagnoses for District Court in Katowice.

Counselling psychologist- Day Psychiatric Ward in Specialistic Hospital no. 4 in Bytom (Poland)
Working as a therapist (individual and group therapy) with adults with mental diseases as addiction, anxiety, depression, schizophrenia, bipolar disorder.

Counselling psychologist- Domestic and Children Support Unit in Ruda Śl;Śska (Poland)
Working as a therapist (individual and group therapy) with children and adults with life issues problems as: mental health problems, domestic violence, sexual abuse, traumas, emotional disorders, bereavement.

(sales, customer service, taking care of exhibition in the shop)

Bartender - Tourist House PTTK Over the Dam in Wisła, Poland
(sales, customer service, preparing drinks, management of small gastronomy).

Warehouse worker- C&S Wholesale Grocers in Newburgh, USA
I was completing the goods on pallets according to the order and preparing of pallets for loading on trucks.
ADDITIONAL WORK EXPERIENCE
Diagnosis of psychological ability to possession of firearms for person directed from provincial police headquarter (Silesia region, Poland).

Lecturer- Centre of Science and Business Żak in Gliwice (Poland)
I was lecture Psychology of older people, Psychology of Health, Clinical Psychology

I was making psychological consultations for young adults about their future career, work opportunities and personal problems.

Coach
I carried of Training of social skills and competency within the framework of the project entitled Strengthening the social integration in the district Bochenski in Ochotnica Dolna (Poland). 32 hours.

I carried the training course Meeting with image specialist within the project Time for activity in the Zator - we are active for the residents of the community Zator.

Psychologist
I worked for ASM Centre for Research and Analysis Market as the interviewer. I made researches in third classes of primary schools, a survey of parents and teachers and interview with school principals. I ntroducted results to a computer database.

education.td2: Diploma in HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript organized by alison.com Online course included modules: Using HTML5 and CSS3 to Build and Format a Web Page, Working with Forms, Using CSS3 Selectors to Style Web Pages, HTML5 Canvas, Video and SVG Elements, Writing your First JavaScript Application, JavaScript Programming Concepts, JavaScript and the Document Object Model, Introduction to jQuery.

Silesian School of Coaches organized by the Association for the Support of Social Initiatives 'Meritum' in Katowice (Poland). Training was improving coaching skills. The course also participated in interpersonal training.
Master of psychology, Faculty of Pedagogy and Psychology at University of Silesia in Katowice (Poland).
